name: Bullet-hell Fishing
description:
Some weird dude asked you to clean the danmaku lake for him. He have a lot of money, and he doesn't even want the fish, he just want them dead. But beware, it won't be a walk on the park. After all, this lake have a name to hold

Inspired by ridiculous fishing, throw your fishing as deep as you can, catch as many fish as you can, and shoot as much fish as you can with your danmaku! But beware of the seahorses, they can manage jellyfish like true masters

The game was originally made for mobile. But the game is still fully playable on computer.

R - Drill

The game was meant to be made in 3 days. I had a small idea, but not something that i would code for hundreds of hours, so way not trying to program it like in a game jam?  It's a cool challenge, i will probably learn something, and it can make some ad for my futur game witch wrath. Yeah, it actually took 10 days, if we count the days that i procrastinated. Was it possible in 3 days? If i had worked more, probably. But well, at least it's not stuck on developping since a year like witch wrath.

Join my discord to follow my others games! https://discord.gg/xCgzGwCNSM
